name: Formic Software
overview:
Founded in 1991, Formic provides a wide selection of data capture survey solutions and currently help over 2,000 customers to manage their auditing and surveying projects.

Formic has also created an enterprise-level solution which is designed to address the needs of NHS Trusts, Public Sector organisations and small and medium-size companies. Titled Formic Fusion Enterprise, this solution is designed to capture data from survey projects across an organisation. Formic Fusion Enterprise provides a central database of information used to inform strategic management decisions and align a projects priorities with it’s business goals.

Formic supports customers directly from its offices in Middlesex, with a range of services including consultancy, training and technical support. Outside the UK, a network of partners supply and support our International customers.
